channel.title: [Pi] Adding PlayerName Has Joined Server?
channel.description:
Hey How Do I Add *Player Dog Has Joined Server*, Which Files And What Do I Add, Are Is There Any Snippets, I Tried Searching Google, And It Just Comes Up With Minecraft.
Please Help :( Thanks

item.title: [Pi] Adding PlayerName Has Joined Server?
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

taken soul:

i know me to i want to add that but no one will tell us i dont know why

Learn some Java and you’d know set it up.

OT: Search for the ‘addStarter’ method in your PlayerAssistant class.

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi] Adding PlayerName Has Joined Server?
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

In Client.java, in your initialize method, add something like

if (playerRights == 0) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage(playerName +" has just logged in."); } } }

Note: this will only do it if a normal player logs in, if you want it for an Admin or so, change a few things like

if (playerRights == 2) { //the player rights: 0 = player, 1 = mod, 2 = admin, 3 = owner for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage("Admin " +playerName +" has just logged in."); } } }

Read full topic
